text: Long Day's Journey into Night is a tragedy play in four acts written by American playwright Eugene O'Neill in 1941â€“42, first published in 1956. The play is seen to be his best work and one of the best American plays of the 20th century. O'Neill posthumously won the 1957 Pulitzer Prize for Drama for Long Day's Journey into Night. ==References== Category:American plays Category:1940s plays Category:1942 works
title: Long Day's Journey into Night
